Module com.dlsc.gemsfx
Package com.dlsc.gemsfx

Class PaymentOptionView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • com.dlsc.gemsfx.PaymentOptionView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class PaymentOptionView
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
    A control for displaying different types of payment options, e.g. various credit cards (MasterCard, American Express, Visa) but also new online options such as PayPal or ApplePay. The default width is initialized with 100 pixels, however the images are much bigger than that (500x300).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  PaymentOptionView.Option
      The list of supported payment options consisting of popular credit cards and online payment options.
      static class  PaymentOptionView.Theme
      The payment option supports two different themes.
